com.coffee.tableapplication

Class ScoreboardFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.coffee.tableapplication.TabletBaseFragment
        • com.coffee.tableapplication.ScoreboardFragment

  • public class ScoreboardFragment
extends TabletBaseFragment
    A fragment representing a list of Items.

    Large screen devices (such as tablets) are supported by replacing the ListView with a GridView.

    Activities containing this fragment MUST implement the interface.
